casebody.data:
William B. KASS and Frank B. Sheldon, Plaintiffs in Error, v. UNITED STATES, Defendant in Error. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. November 21, 1924.) No. 71. Samuel Hershenstein, of New York City, for plaintiffs in error. William Hayward, U. S. Atty., of New York City (Abraham I. Menin, Asst. U. S. Atty., of New York City, of counsel), for the United States.

Before ROGERS, HOUGH, and MANTON, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed.
